intro: Randia katentaniae, commonly known as the Katentania randia, is a species of flowering plant native to the Caribbean. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and elliptical, glossy leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments, often found in tropical forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
